title: Welding Complete - Techniques, Project Plans N Instructions (2e)
description: Welding Complete: Techniques, Project Plans & Instructions (2nd Ed) By Michael A. Reser Cool Springs Press July 2017 | ISBN-10: 159186691X | True PDF | 240 Pages | 58.4 mb Welding is a fun and surprisingly affordable activity, with complete welding kits available at home-improvement stores for a few hundred dollars. This book shows you everything you need to know to become a competent and safe welder of a wide variety of metal projects. Featured projects include a coffee table, magazine rack, wine rack, truck rack, firepit, and gate. The time has never been better to learn to weld. New tools and equipment are lower in price and easier to use. Growing interest in metalworking has made supplies easier to come by, with most home-improvement stores now stocking a variety of metals and fuels. As interest in welding expands, the number of great plans and designs continues to grow. For evidence you need only open this updated edition of Welding Complete. Packed with fresh designs and up-to-date information, this new book is your personal metal shop teacher.
